channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- SolarWinds Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- SolarWinds Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-38108|2024-08-03T10:45:52.518Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-47504|2024-08-03T14:55:08.311Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-47509|2024-08-03T14:55:08.382Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Incorrect Input Neutralization Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with a valid SolarWinds Platform account to append URL parameters to inject HTML.

item.title: CVE-2022-36957|2024-08-03T10:21:32.186Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-36958|2024-08-03T10:21:32.213Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with valid access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-47505|2024-08-03T14:55:08.170Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a local adversary with a valid system user account to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-47507|2024-08-03T14:55:08.185Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-36964|2024-08-03T10:21:32.335Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with valid access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-36962|2024-08-03T10:21:32.342Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to Command Injection. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with complete control over the SolarWinds database to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-36960|2024-08-03T10:21:32.333Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to Improper Input Validation. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with valid access to SolarWinds Web Console to escalate user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-38111|2024-08-03T10:45:52.621Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-47503|2024-08-03T14:55:08.197Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Deserialization of Untrusted Data. This vulnerability allows a remote adversary with Orion admin-level account access to SolarWinds Web Console to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-36966|2024-08-03T10:21:32.223Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: Users with Node Management rights were able to view and edit all nodes due to Insufficient control on URL parameter causing insecure direct object reference (IDOR) vulnerability in SolarWinds Platform 2022.3 and previous.

item.title: CVE-2022-47506|2024-08-03T14:55:08.359Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to the Directory Traversal Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a local adversary with authenticated account access to edit the default configuration, enabling the execution of arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-28996|2024-08-02T01:03:51.481Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a SWQL Injection Vulnerability. Attack complexity is high for this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28999|2024-08-02T01:03:51.426Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a Race Condition Vulnerability affecting the web console.

item.title: CVE-2024-29000|2024-08-02T01:03:51.521Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29003|2024-08-02T01:03:51.506Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a XSS vulnerability that affects the maps section of the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and requires user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-29004|2024-08-02T01:03:51.367Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28076|2024-08-02T00:48:48.245Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a Arbitrary Open Redirection Vulnerability. A potential attacker can redirect to different domain when using URL parameter with relative entry in the correct format

item.title: CVE-2024-29001|2024-08-02T01:03:51.636Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: A SolarWinds Platform SWQL Injection Vulnerability was identified in the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and user interaction to be exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-29000|2024-06-06T15:36:39.203Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description: A SolarWinds Platform SWQL Injection Vulnerability was identified in the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and user interaction to be exploited.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a XSS vulnerability that affects the maps section of the user interface. This vulnerability requires authentication and requires user interaction.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability affecting the web console. A high-privileged user and user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was susceptible to a Arbitrary Open Redirection Vulnerability. A potential attacker can redirect to different domain when using URL parameter with relative entry in the correct format

item.title: CVE-2024-28996|2024-06-05T05:15:36.855Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a SWQL Injection Vulnerability. Attack complexity is high for this vulnerability.

item.description: The SolarWinds Platform was determined to be affected by a Race Condition Vulnerability affecting the web console.

item.title: CVE-2023-50395|2024-02-06T15:59:48.664Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability was found using an update statement in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability requires user authentication to be exploited

item.title: CVE-2023-35188|2024-02-06T16:00:21.973Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds%20platform
item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability was found using a create statement in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability requires user authentication to be exploited.

item.description: SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability was found using a create statement in the SolarWinds Platform. This vulnerability requires user authentication to be exploited.
